column1: variable,question_text,description,type,values
consent,"I am 18+ and consent to take part. I understand anonymised data will be published openly.","Consent to participate and allow anonymised data to be published.","categorical","Yes"
prolific_id,"Please enter your Prolific ID (this is required to receive payment).","Unique Prolific participant identifier.","text","Free text"

ai_tools_frequency,"How often do you use digital or AI-powered tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search) in your daily life?","Frequency of AI or digital tool use in daily life.","categorical",""
values_understanding,"I have a clear understanding of my core personal values.","Self-rated clarity of personal values.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
values_explainability,"I can easily explain what matters most to me.","Ease of explaining what matters most.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
values_stability,"My values rarely change over time.","Perceived stability of personal values over time.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
values_confidence,"I feel confident in what I believe is right for me.","Confidence in own sense of what is right.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
values_top3_multi,"Which of the following best represent your top three personal values? (select up to 3)","Top three self-identified personal values (multi-select).","multi_select",""
what_matters_most,"What matters most to you in life?","Open-ended description of what matters most in life.","text","Free text"
life_meaning,"My life feels meaningful.","Perceived meaning in life.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
life_fulfilment,"I feel fulfilled by how I spend my time.","Perceived fulfilment from use of time.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
life_direction,"I have a clear sense of direction in my life.","Clarity of life direction.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
life_uncertainty,"I often feel unsure about what I truly want in life.","Uncertainty about what one truly wants.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
future_motivation,"I feel motivated about my future.","Motivation regarding the future.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
behaviour_alignment,"My daily behaviour reflects my values.","Alignment between daily behaviour and values.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"

behaviour_conflict,"I often behave in ways that conflict with what's important to me.","Frequency of behaving in ways that conflict with values.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"

behaviour_followthrough,"I often know what I should do, but I struggle to follow through in real life.","Difficulty following through on what one believes they should do.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
identity_struggle,"I struggle to be the person I want to be.","Struggle between current self and desired self.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"

values_misaligned_areas_multi,"Which areas of your life feel least aligned with your values? (select all that apply)","Life domains perceived as least aligned with personal values (multi-select).","multi_select",""
wellbeing_cheerful,"I have felt cheerful and in good spirits.","WHO-5 item: feeling cheerful and in good spirits.","numeric",""
wellbeing_calm,"I have felt calm and relaxed.","WHO-5 item: feeling calm and relaxed.","numeric",""
wellbeing_active,"I have felt active and vigorous.","WHO-5 item: feeling active and vigorous.","numeric",""
wellbeing_fresh,"I woke up feeling fresh and rested.","WHO-5 item: waking up feeling fresh and rested.","numeric",""
wellbeing_interest,"My daily life has been filled with things that interest me.","WHO-5 item: daily life filled with things of interest.","numeric",""
selftrust_decisions,"I trust myself to make good decisions.","Trust in own decision-making.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
selftrust_influence,"I feel easily influenced by other people's opinions.","Perceived susceptibility to influence from others.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
selftrust_doubt,"I doubt myself even when I know what I truly value.","Self-doubt despite clarity of values.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
selftrust_compass,"I find it difficult to follow my internal compass.","Difficulty following one's internal compass.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
digital_noise_focus,"Digital noise makes it harder to focus on what matters.","Impact of digital noise on focus on what matters.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"

digital_noise_values,"I often feel distracted from my values by online content.","Perceived distraction from values caused by online content.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"

digital_noise_identity,"I often feel reactive, distracted, or pulled away from the person I want to become.","Perceived impact of digital life on becoming the person one wants to be.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
ai_influence_decisions,"AI tools sometimes influence how I think about decisions.","Perceived influence of AI tools on decision-making.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"

ai_prefer_self_judgement,"I prefer to rely on my own judgement rather than AI suggestions.","Preference for own judgement over AI suggestions.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"

ai_society_meaning,"I worry that AI could push society away from meaningful things.","Concern that AI could move society away from meaningful things.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
ai_train_values,"AI should be trained to reflect core human values.","Belief that AI systems should reflect core human values.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"

ai_understand_values,"Understanding what humans value is important for future AI systems.","Belief that understanding what humans value is important for future AI.","numeric","1–7 (1 = Strongly disagree, 7 = Strongly agree)"
ai_values_multi,"Which values do you believe AI systems should reflect? (select up to 3)","Values participants believe AI systems should reflect (multi-select).","multi_select",""
age_group,"What is your age group?","Participant age group category.","categorical",""
work_status,"Which of the following best describes your current work status?","Participant employment status.","categorical",""
education_level,"What is your highest level of education?","Participant highest level of education completed.","categorical",""
country,"Country of residence","Participant country of residence.","categorical",""
gender,"Which of the following best describes your gender?","Participant gender identity (self-described within listed categories).","categorical",""
emotional_wellbeing,"How would you describe your general emotional wellbeing?","Self-rated general emotional wellbeing.","categorical",""
